title: Web Frontend Developer - Felix Rangel
description: Web Frontend Developer from Esteli, Nicaragua. Specialist in HTML5, CSS5, JavaScript ES6+, Node.js and WordPress.

hero.title: Hello I'm Felix Rangel!
hero.description: Specialist in HTML5, CSS5, JavaScript ES6+, Node.js and WordPress.

jobs_description.title: Web Frontend Developer
jobs_description.description: I create modern websites with good UI/UX practices. I also manage SEO, security and performance optimizations to increase conversion and visits.

jobs_description.title: WordPress Web Developer
jobs_description.description: I was in charge of developing WordPress websites for clients in Nicaragua, during my time at the agency I contributed my knowledge in web security by increasing measures and decreasing security gaps in WordPress, configuring plugins and setting HTTP headers such as Content-Security-Policy (CSP), Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy (CORP), Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy (COOP), etc.

projects.title: Calculadora Payoneer Nicaragua
projects.description: Discover an essential tool for freelancers and businesses in Nicaragua. Our Calculadora Payoneer Nicaragua allows you to calculate precisely and quickly the rates and commissions when receiving international payments through Payoneer. Start using it today and take control of your finances!

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm a Midudev and ManzDev mod but I'm happier being an AnaRangel mod
about.description: I am a Frontend Web Developer and WordPress Developer with over 3 years of experience, specialized in creating modern designs and optimizing web performance, with a focus on technologies such as HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript ES6+ and WordPress. I handle frameworks such as React and Astro, and I am an expert in WordPress visual builders, in addition to having a strong technical knowledge in Core Web Vitals, which makes me a passionate and highly qualified professional for any web development project.
